import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { CustomHook } from "../hooks/CustomHook"; import { LockClosedIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import axios from "axios"; const Register = () => { const history = useHistory(); const username = CustomHook("username"); const email = CustomHook("email"); const password = CustomHook("password"); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("/api/auth/register", { username: username.value, email: email.value, password: password.value, }) .then((res) => res.data) .then(() => history.push("/login")); }; return (

); }; export default Register;
